title: AdCP Extension File Schema
description: Schema that all extension files must follow. Combines metadata (valid_from, docs_url) with the actual extension data schema. Extensions are auto-discovered from /schemas/extensions/*.json and included in versioned builds based on valid_from/valid_until.

description.description: Description of what this extension provides

valid_from.description: Minimum AdCP version this extension is compatible with (e.g., '2.5'). Extension will be included in all versioned schema builds >= this version.

valid_until.description: Last AdCP version this extension is compatible with (e.g., '3.0'). Omit if extension is still valid for current and future versions.

docs_url.description: URL to documentation for implementors of this extension

type.description: Extensions must be objects (data within ext.{namespace})

properties.description: Schema properties defining the structure of ext.{namespace} data

required.description: Required properties within the extension data

additionalProperties.description: Whether additional properties are allowed in the extension data
